name: Match It Fast (Arcy)
description:
Origami rabbits with guns are trying to extinguish your flame! You must strike back!

In Match it Fast, you play as a small match which travels an endless dungeon full of enemies and traps that will try to stop you at any cost!

But be careful, you only have a couple of seconds before you burn to the ground. How far can you get before you turn to ash?  Will you reach be able to reach the top of the leaderboard?

Controls: 

 Movement: WASD / Left Joystick 

 Dodge: Spacebar / L2 

 Shoot: Mouse 1 / R2

Created by Hammad Khan
